name: SuperCountriesEth

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Unlocks ERC721 behaviour, allowing for trading on third party platforms.
attributes.name: enableERC721

attributes.documentation: @dev Creates new Struct for a country each time a new country is listed.
attributes.name: newEntity

attributes.documentation:
@dev Update the Struc each time a country is sold.
Push the newOwner, update the price history
attributes.name: updateEntity
confirmDividends

attributes.documentation: @dev Second step to withdraw : after confirming divs, players can withdraw divs to their wallet
attributes.name: withdraw

attributes.documentation: @dev After 7 days without any buy, the richest user and the latest player will share the contract balance !
attributes.name: confirmDividendsFromPot

attributes.documentation:
@dev If no new buys occur (dividendsScore = 0) and the richest and latest players don't withdraw their dividends after 3 jackpots, the game can be stuck forever
Prevent from jackpot vicious circle : same dividends are shared between latest and richest users again and again
If the richest and/or the latest player withdraw(s) at least once between 3 jackpots, it means the game is alive
Or if contract balance drops down to 1e8 wei (that means many successful jackpots and that a current withdrawal could cost too much gas for players)
attributes.name: withdrawAll

attributes.documentation:
@dev Get the referrer of a player.
@param player The address of the player to get the referrer of.
attributes.name: getReferrerOf
setReferrer

attributes.documentation:
@dev Dispatch the referrer bonus when a country is sold
@param referralDivToPay which dividends percentage will be dispatched to refererrs : 0 if no referrer, 2.5% if 1 referrer, 5% if 2
attributes.name: payReferrer

attributes.documentation: @dev Dispatch dividends to former owners of a country
attributes.name: bonusPreviousOwner
updateScoreAndBalance

attributes.documentation:
@dev Update the worldScore
After each buy, the worldscore increases : 2x current purchase price - 1x previousPrice
attributes.name: updateWorldScore

attributes.documentation: @dev Update timestampLimit : the date on which the richest player and the last buyer will be able to share the contract balance (1/4 each)
attributes.name: updateTimestampLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Refund the buyer if excess
attributes.name: excessRefund

attributes.documentation: is Contract ///
attributes.name: isContract

attributes.documentation:
@dev Fallback function to accept all ether sent directly to the contract
Nothing is lost, it will raise the jackpot !
